items.name: Goku
items.description: The protagonist of the series, known for his great power and friendly personality.

items.name: Vegeta
items.description: Prince of the Saiyans, initially a villain, but later joins the Z Fighters.

items.name: Piccolo
items.description: He is a Namekian who emerged after being created in the last moments of his father's life, being his current reincarnation.

items.name: Bulma
items.description: Bulma is the feMale protagonist of the Dragon Ball manga series and its anime adaptations Dragon Ball, Dragon Ball Z, Dragon Ball Super, and Dragon Ball GT.

items.name: Frieza
items.description: Frieza is the space tyrant and the main antagonist of the Frieza saga.

items.name: Zarbon
items.description: Zarbon is one of Frieza's henchmen and a powerful fighter.

items.name: Dodoria
items.description: Dodoria is another henchman of Frieza known for his brutality.

items.name: Ginyu
items.description: Ginyu is the leader of the most prestigious mercenary elite of the Freeza Army, which is named the Ginew Special Forces in his honor.[9]

items.name: Cell
items.description: Cell, known as CÃ©lula in Spain, is a bioandroid created by Dr. Gero's computer, who came from the future of line 3 with the intention of taking revenge on Goku for having destroyed the Red Ribbon Army, and with it the dream of

items.name: Gohan
items.description: Son Gohanda in his time in Spain, or simply Gohan in Latin America, is one of the main characters of the story arcs of Dragon Ball Z, Dragon Ball Super and Dragon Ball GT.

items.name: Krillin
items.description: Goku's close friend and brave warrior, he is a character from the Dragon Ball manga and anime.

items.name: Tenshinhan
items.description: Master of martial arts and member of the Z Fighters.

items.name: Yamcha
items.description: Fighter who used to be a desert bandit.

items.name: Chi-Chi
items.description: Goku's wife and Gohan's mother.

items.name: Gotenks
items.description: Gotenks, also initially known as Gotrunk in the Spanish dub of Spain, is the result of the Fusion Dance performed correctly by Goten and Trunks.

items.name: Trunks
items.description: Son of Vegeta and Bulma.

items.name: Master Roshi
items.description: Martial arts teacher and Goku's mentor.

items.name: Bardock
items.description: He is a low-class Saiyan from Planet Vegeta in Universe 7. He belongs to the Saiyan Army, which is under the leadership of King Vegeta, and is the leader of his squad during the annexation of the planet by the colonial forces of the Freeza Empire.

items.name: Launch
items.description: Character who suffers personality changes when sneezing.

items.name: Mr. Satan
items.description: Human fighter famous for taking credit for the Z Fighters' victories.

items.name: Dende
items.description: Piccolo's successor as the new Namekian protector of Earth.

items.name: Android 17
items.description: Before being kidnapped, he is the twin brother of Android Number 18, who like her before being an Android was a normal Human until they were kidnapped by Dr. Gero, and that is why they hate him.

items.name: Android 16
items.description: Android 16 is a giant android known for his love of nature and life.

items.name: Android 19
items.description: Android 19 is one of the androids created by Dr. Gero.

items.name: Android 20 (Dr. Gero)
items.description: Dr. Gero is the mad scientist who created Androids 17, 18, and 19.

items.name: Android 13
items.description: Android 13 is a dangerous android that appears in the movie "Cooler Returns."

items.name: Android 14
items.description: Android 14 is another android that appears in the same movie as Android 13.

items.name: Android 15
items.description: Android 15 is another android that appears in the same movie as Android 13.

items.name: Nail
items.description: He is a Namekian (inhabitant of the planet Namek), who is characterized by being part of the few members of the "warrior lineage", and being the most powerful among them along with Piccolo.

items.name: Raditz
items.description: He is the son of Bardock and Gine, and older brother of Son Goku.

items.name: Babidi
items.description: Also known as BÃ³bidi or BÃ¡bidi, he is a powerful Madoshi sorcerer, "son" of the great magician Bibbidi, founder of the Majin family.

items.name: Majin Buu
items.description: Also known as Original Boo, he is the original, pure form of Majin-Boo, and the last form of Boo to appear in Dragon Ball Z.

items.name: Bills
items.description: God of Destruction Beerus, also known as Beers, or Beerus in Latin America and initially in Spain[1], is a character that was introduced in the film Dragon Ball Z: Battle of the Gods, where he is the main antagonist of the film.

items.name: Whis
items.description: Whis is one of the sons of the High Priest, younger brother of Vados, Korn and Kus.

items.name: Zeno
items.description: Zeno is the supreme being of the multiverse and has overwhelming power. The King of Everything, also known as Zen Oo (Zeno Sama in Spain and Zen Oo Sama in Latin America) and nicknamed by Son Goku as Todito (å¨ããã¡ãã, Zen-chan

items.name: Kibito-Shin
items.description: It is the fusion between Shin and Kibito.

items.name: Jiren
items.description: Jiren is a powerful fighter from Universe 11 and one of the most formidable opponents in the tournament.

items.name: Toppo
items.description: Toppo is the leader of the Pride Troops, warriors of justice from Universe 11 who act as protectors of peace and superheroes of good.

items.name: Dyspo
items.description: Dyspo is one of the members of Team Universe 11 as one of the most powerful soldiers of the Pride Troops along with Jiren and their leader Toppo.

items.name: Marcarite
items.description: Marcarita is the guiding angel of Universe 11, servant and martial arts teacher of the God of Destruction Vermoud.

items.name: Vermoudh
items.description: He is the individual who currently holds the position of God of Destruction in Universe 11, a position he obtained after abandoning his membership as a Pride Soldier within the Pride Troops.

items.name: Grand Priest
items.description: The Grand Priest is the tournament supervisor and one of the most powerful beings.

items.name: North Kaio (Kaito)
items.description: This is the god in charge of managing the Northern Galaxies, the northern quadrant of Universe 7 and supervising the gods of the planets in said sector (as is the case of Kami on Earth)

items.name: Android 18
items.description: She is the twin sister of Android Number 17 and an "android" created from a Human base by Dr. Gero for the sole purpose of destroying Goku.

items.name: Gogeta
items.description: Gogeta is the resulting fusion of Son Goku and Vegeta, when they perform the Fusion Dance correctly to confront Broly.

items.name: Vegetto
items.description: Vegetto is the strongest character within the original manga and one of the most powerful characters in the entire series in general.

items.name: Janemba
items.description: Janemba is a demon of pure evil and great evil power.

items.name: Broly
items.description: Broly is a Saiyan who possesses gigantic and uncontrollable power, which manifests itself in all its magnitude when he becomes the Legendary Super Saiyan.

items.name: South Kaio
items.description: The South Kaio is the only reference we have to the other KaiÅ gods in the manga, beyond the North KaiÅ Sama since he is the only KaiÅ, along with the North KaiÅ, to appear in the manga, and one of the four

items.name: East Kaio
items.description: The Eastern KaiÅ is a Kaio that only appears in the anime.

items.name: West Kaio
items.description: The KaiÅ of the West is the rival of the Kaio of the North.

items.name: Great Kaio
items.description: Great Kaio is the most important Kaio of the Other World and is the God who is responsible for managing the other KaiÅ to take care of whose sectors of the Galaxy.

items.name: Eastern Kaio-shin
items.description: He is one of the Kaio-shin, the gods of creation who are responsible for creating life throughout Universe 7 and protecting it from supreme threats.

items.name: Northern Kaio-shin
items.description: The Northern KaiÅ-shin is another of the KaiÅ-shin who lived alongside the rest of the Kaio-shin and Dai Kaio-shin 5 million years ago, and who fought against Majin Buu.

items.name: South Kaio-shin
items.description: The Southern Kaio-shin was the ruler of the southern quadrant of the universe and was the most powerful among the Kaio-shin.

items.name: Western Kaio-shin
items.description: The KaiÅ-shin of the West is a Kaio-shin, who lived alongside her companions, she was the first to die in the terrible battle fought against Majin Buu 5 million years ago.

items.name: Great Kaio-shin
items.description: The Great Kaio-shin, also known as Sacred Kaiosama in Latin America, was the main Kaio-shin of Universe 7 and supervisor of the other Kaio-shin of the same universe.

items.name: Kibito
items.description: Kibito is the assistant and bodyguard of the Eastern Kaio-shin.
